name: International Mixed Entertainment Select Add-On
description: International Mixed Entertainment Select Add-On adds a curated set of mixed channels to your base plan. Offers international news and entertainment from multiple regions and languages.

name: Kids Zone Mixed Entertainment Unlimited Add-On
description: Kids Zone Mixed Entertainment Unlimited Add-On adds a curated set of mixed channels to your base plan. Built for families seeking safe, age-appropriate programming with a strong focus on kids.
